heading: BUSINESS PROBLEM
contentone: Customers today do not have the same confidence to buy online, as they do in-store. This is largely due to:
contenttwo: Globally over 76% of carts are abandoned due to low customer confidence leading to over $2 trillion+ in lost sales.

heading: SOLUTION
